title: and Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development, Maritime
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development, Maritime 
and Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) 
(No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development maritime valuation (amendment) act 2022 (commencement certain provisions) (no 2) order 2023

title: and Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions)
heading: 2. The 16th day of December 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 16th day of December 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Planning and Development, Maritime and 
Valuation (Amendment) Act 2022 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 10 to 21, 

(b) 

sections 23 to 40, and 

(c) 

subsections (8) to (12) of section 41. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 December, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 19th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [645] 3
